title: Smoky Chicken and Cheesy Potato Casserole
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly grease a 3 quart rectangular baking dish; set aside. In a large bowl, combine soup, sour cream, and cheese. Stir in hash brown potatoes and chicken. Transfer chickien mixture to the prepared baking dish.
In a small bowl, combine crushed croutons and melted butter; sprinkle over chicken mixture.
Bake, uncovered, for 40-50 minutes or until heated through. Garnish with fresh thyme.
ingredients: 1 (10 3/4 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken with herbs soup
1 1‚ÅÑ2 cups shredded smoked cheddar cheese (6 ounces)
1 (28 ounce) packagefrozen diced hash brown potatoes with onions and bell peppers, thawed
1 lb roasted chicken, cut into bite-size strips
